ygData.subject: Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone noticed anything strange about Kiteing. Either I have lost my touch or something has been altered. I cant seem to get the patteren down to kite.
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone noticed anything strange about Kiteing. Either I have lost my
touch or something has been altered. I cant seem to get the patteren down to
kite. Last night I tried to Kite a Deepwater Croc that was blue to me and it
was tearing me up Thankfully there was a kindly ranger nearby to help me. I
was using the DDD/CoD/Hymm twisting with an occasional selos to try and keep
distance away from him bit it just seem like i was get torn up. Anyone have
any ideas?

Taerian Valmont of Povar
